resources.string: Service which allows you to lock your apps

Since the no-Xposed version uses an accessibility service, it works on every device without system modifications, but also consumes a lot more RAM (system memory) and battery.\nIt\'s therefore highly recommended to use the default implementation if you have the possibility to install Xposed or already have it installed!
Accessibility service is not enabled. Tap here to enable in settings, without it, app locking won\'t work!
